setting.name: AutomaticDialing
setting.label: Automatic Dialing
setting.description: If enabled calls received on this PSTN line will be automatically sent to the destination (extension or user) specified below.

setting.name: Extension
setting.label: Extension
setting.description: Specify the destination for incoming calls on this PSTN line, such as an auto-attendant, a hunt group, an ACD queue, or any internal extension, user or alias.
